mapper.insert: insert into bts_order_items ( id, order_child_no, user_id, remark, merchant_id, spu_id, sku_id, goods_name, goods_pic, propertys, quantity, refund_quantity, goods_original_price, goods_price, goods_amount, coupon_amount, point_amount, discount_amount, freight_amount, payable_amount, pay_amount, is_comment, ctime, mtime )values ( #{id}, #{orderChildNo}, #{userId}, #{remark}, #{merchantId}, #{spuId}, #{skuId}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsPic}, #{propertys}, #{quantity}, #{refundQuantity}, #{goodsOriginalPrice}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsAmount}, #{couponAmount}, #{pointAmount}, #{discountAmount}, #{freightAmount}, #{payableAmount}, #{payAmount}, #{isComment}, #{ctime}, #{mtime} )
mapper.update:
update bts_order_items
id=#{id},
order_child_no=#{orderChildNo},
user_id=#{userId},
remark=#{remark},
merchant_id=#{merchantId},
spu_id=#{spuId},
sku_id=#{skuId},
goods_name=#{goodsName},
goods_pic=#{goodsPic},
propertys=#{propertys},
quantity=#{quantity},
refund_quantity=#{refundQuantity},
goods_original_price=#{goodsOriginalPrice},
goods_price=#{goodsPrice},
goods_amount=#{goodsAmount},
coupon_amount=#{couponAmount},
point_amount=#{pointAmount},
discount_amount=#{discountAmount},
freight_amount=#{freightAmount},
payable_amount=#{payableAmount},
pay_amount=#{payAmount},
is_comment=#{isComment},
ctime=#{ctime},
mtime=#{mtime},
id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, order_child_no, user_id, remark, merchant_id, spu_id, sku_id, goods_name, goods_pic, propertys, quantity, refund_quantity, goods_original_price, goods_price, goods_amount, coupon_amount, point_amount, discount_amount, freight_amount, payable_amount, pay_amount, is_comment, ctime, mtime from bts_order_items where id=#{id}

select id, order_child_no, user_id, remark, merchant_id, spu_id, sku_id, goods_name, goods_pic, propertys, quantity, refund_quantity, goods_original_price, goods_price, goods_amount, coupon_amount, point_amount, discount_amount, freight_amount, payable_amount, pay_amount, is_comment, ctime, mtime from bts_order_items where id=#{id}

select id, order_child_no, user_id, remark, merchant_id, spu_id, sku_id, goods_name, goods_pic, propertys, quantity, refund_quantity, goods_original_price, goods_price, goods_amount, coupon_amount, point_amount, discount_amount, freight_amount, payable_amount, pay_amount, is_comment, ctime, mtime
limit #{offset},#{rows}
